comment: Andrew Thomas: My experience with ThinkMarkets has been excellent. Their platform is user-friendly and their fees are competitive.
Charlotte Lewis: I've been using ThinkMarkets for over a year and have been very pleased with their service. The trading platform is reliable and customer support is excellent.
